description: This table contains the Adverse Event information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line (ORM) record.

columns.name: ADVERSE_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The adverse event category number for the adverse event that occurred.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ADV_EVENT_TIME
columns.description: The time at which the adverse event occurred.
